LIBFLIAPI FLISetNFlushes

(flidev_t dev, long nflushes)

Set the number of flushes for a given camera.

Documentation

Set the number of flushes for a given camera. This function sets the number of times the CCD array of camera dev is flushed before exposing a frame to nflushes. The valid range of the nflushes parameter is from 1 to 16.
Parameters:
dev - Camera to set the number of flushes of.
nflushes - Number of times to flush CCD array before an exposure.
Returns:
Zero on success.
Non-zero on failure.
See Also:
FLIFlushRow
FLIExposeFrame
